snippet.title: Tom Sietsema: At Carolina Kitchen, southern-fried sweetness governs cooking, greeting
snippet.description: At Carolina Kitchen on Rhode Island Row, sugar glazes the attitude, and the cooking.

snippet.title: In West Bank, teen offenders face different fates
snippet.description: The boys were both 15, with the crackly voices and awkward peach fuzz of adolescence. They lived just a few minutes away from one another in the West Bank. And both were accused of throwing stones at vehicles, one day after the other.

snippet.title: 9 things you didn't know about the office cubicle
snippet.description: One of the original designers predicted corporate zombies.

snippet.title: Wonkbook: Don't count out immigration reform just yet
snippet.description: There are signs of hope for immigration reform.

snippet.title: Open source seeds: An agro-giant alternative
snippet.description: The Open Source Seed Initiative wants to free the seed

snippet.title: 21 fresh bars for every occasion
snippet.description: A toast to Washington's fresh batch of bars: Places to sip, snack and celebrate right now.

snippet.title: Trait by trait, plant scientists swiftly weed out bad seeds through marker-assisted breeding
snippet.description: A wide variety of plant scientists embrace the cutting-edge technology of marker-assisted DNA selection.

snippet.title: At a shad planking in southern Va., politicians enjoy bipartisanship, bluegrass and bony fish
snippet.description: Democratic Sen. Mark Warner and other Va. politicians of all stripes gathered at the annual political meet-and-greet.

snippet.title: Freeze warning: Factoring the frost odds for spring planting success
snippet.description: After this resilient winter, I can't blame my fellow gardeners for wanting to get out there and get planting. But with a freeze warning in effect tonight, there are things to consider.
